What a great afternoon with Benton County Republican Party for their Lincoln Day Dinner at the Benton County Country Club. I was thrilled and honored to be the Keynote Speaker for this event. — at Benton County Country Club https://t.co/l4Jo0aeO8X

Tonight, it was an honor to be the Keynote for the Lake County Republican Lincoln Day Dinner. The Chairman and his team did a great job organizing the evening with a very large crowd. But it was also a beautiful... https://t.co/6tNt5IpZLn
It was a great group of patriots tonight at the Cass County Republican LDD. — in Cass County, IN https://t.co/zwkIhLEBaq
Montgomery County GOP has a great crowd at their Lincoln Day Dinner this evening. Thank you for the warm reception and words of encouragement.

Great crowd tonight at the Clinton County, Indiana, Republican Party Lincoln Day Dinner. I had the chance to give a brief update on our first few months serving in Congress. Being back in the district with my fellow Hoosier Republicans is energizing and refreshing!

#TBT to last fall in Benton County where the community showcased their tremendous agricultural production. Today is #NationalAgDay and we're blessed to have counties all across Indiana's 4th Congressional District that play a major role in feeding... https://t.co/dmNEYmx2rE
Yesterday evening I had the privilege to speak with the Parke County GOP at their annual Lincoln Day Dinner. I enjoyed visiting with longtime friends and sharing a few stories. Great to see everyone!
Stopped by the Warren County & Fountain County joint Lincoln Day event this afternoon. Thanks for the warm welcome!

So much fun to spend the evening with the Friends of the NRA. It was an honor to help award the bronze trophy to the most senior veteran in attendance. This great crowd is just another reminder that we must protect our 2nd Amendment right.
“I don’t know how you can live in this country and enjoy the freedoms that we have and talk about Socialism.”... https://t.co/QGJ8UtX7p3
It was an honor to keynote the Newton County Republican Party Lincoln Day Dinner this evening. Thanks for having me!

Spent the morning enjoying a great breakfast at the Hendricks County Republican Party Chairman’s Breakfast. The focus for the breakfast series in 2019 is on local government. This morning we heard from local leaders in Plainfield, Danville and Clayton.

Thanks to all who braved the weather to spend the morning at the Hendricks County Republican Party Chairman’s Breakfast. Great to have our local town judges speak and share about the role they play in their... https://t.co/3AVw8fJEt7

Congratulations to Halle Shoults of Benton County as she was selected Indiana State Fair Queen.

Also, I want to congratulate the other top finishers Maci French Miss Boone County, Raegan... https://t.co/Atd9W3qHzI

As I take a moment to reflect on the last few days. I would like to thank all of my family, friends, and supporters that took the time to come to Washington as I took my oath of office.

Welcome to Congress, @ElectJimBaird & @DanCrenshawTX. https://t.co/NU7YnbAE4u
This morning we toured Putnam County Comprehensive Services. It was great to learn more about the services they provide our communities.

Always a good day when it starts with fellowship at the Morgan County Indiana Republican Party monthly breakfast. Having the freedom to meet in this manner and share ideas between constituents and elected... https://t.co/q6AOMUgTA8
The passage of the Farm Bill is critical to so many constituents in the Indiana 4th congressional district. I am pleased that... https://t.co/XZNj9zQYPi
Glad to spend yesterday evening with the Greater Lafayette Chamber of Commerce. We talked about legislative goals and all of their hard work to help Tippecanoe grow and thrive.
I enjoyed the opportunity to speak with the greater Lafayette Chamber of Commerce. https://t.co/qOwp2FP5ib

After church this morning, I headed to Brownsburg to meet with Congressman Rokita. I truly appreciate his time, support, and efforts to make this transition as smooth as possible for the constituents of CD 04. — eating lunch at Flap Jacks https://t.co/JgmHgoMoYd

Last week I was in Washington attending final orientation for new members of Congress. Also, my team and I started working to set up the office to allow me to best serve Hoosiers constituent of the 4th District! — at United States Capitol https://t.co/1n7g8ZOInI
Thank you, Don Harris! https://t.co/y2ccre35Tl
Thank you for your support Jennie Hodgen! https://t.co/Gv1J4ufoJF
Special day out on the campaign trail as we travel the 4th District on the #RightTrackResults Tour. Energy was high and Republicans are getting out to vote!

Last night was an incredible night as we welcomed President Donald J. Trump and Vice President Mike Pence back to the great Hoosier State!  

Now, lets GET OUT and VOTE on Tuesday!

I am ready to be your voice in Washington! https://t.co/YgJMtjWmwM

Thank you to the Kokomo Rotary for inviting me to speak with you today during your lunch meeting. As a fellow Rotarian I am grateful for this civic organization and what they do to support not only their community and our Country, but the whole world.
Huge crowd in Plainfield this morning as we talk to Hoosiers about getting out to vote!
https://t.co/ewSGqInOtt
Last night I participated in a candidate forum in Warren County. Thanks to everyone who came out to ask questions and learn more about why I care so deeply about our Congressional district.

#TBT Being endorsed by Indiana Farm Bureau ELECT is an honor. I’m proud of my agricultural background and the work I’ve done to help protect and support farmers across our Congressional district. https://t.co/0jWhIz6zYj
Congrats to my Boilermakers on the huge victory! #BoilerUp https://t.co/C8EfLQ5cqM
Started the day with a meet and greet in Delphi. It’s a great day to be on the campaign trail!
Great crowd last night at the White County GOP hog roast!
Fall is in full swing and what better way to enjoy this weather than a chili cook-off! Thanks to the Tippecanoe GOP Women’s Club for hosting.
We had a lot of fun visiting with voters in Jasper County this evening. Thanks for coming out and for all the support!
Happy National Farmer's Day. Thank you to all the farmers across the Hoosier state that help feed the world. https://t.co/RAbBloGqgo
It was a pleasure to participate in Pizza & Politics hosted by the Builders Association of Greater Lafayette. Thanks to all the voters and candidates that came out tonight.
Thanks to the Danville High School U.S. Government Classes for hosting a Meet the Candidate Night!
Incredible tour of Bosma Enterprises today. They're providing empowering opportunity for the visually impaired through employment and education.
Fun evening in Danville! Thanks to all who visited with us and showed their support and encouragement.

This evening I participated in the Indiana Corn & Soybean Alliance Shop Talk forum in Tippecanoe County. We talked about the issues impacting the agricultural community and the important role they play in the Hoosier economy and feeding the world.

It was great to see some many friends and supporters at all of the community events today.  Plus, you could not have asked for better weather at the Cloverween parade. I am finishing my night enjoying great music at the Roachdale Ribs and Blues Fest with good friends.
Thank you for your support! I always love stopping for Pizza in West Lebanon! https://t.co/LjlTSfPJ3g
The Hendricks County Republican Party is ready to turn out the vote and support Indiana Republicans. Thanks to all who came out and showed their support.
Great to be with fellow Boilermakers celebrating homecoming. Congrats to the football team on the big win!
Fillmore VFD Annual BBQ Dinner was well attended and enjoyed by all. It's always good to break bread with friends and neighbors. — in Fillmore, IN https://t.co/Rc1A5pqPaY
Team Baird is working hard to reach voters all across the district. Only 49 days until Election Day!
This morning we visited with the Hendricks County Republican Party. It was a great way to kick off our Tuesday on the campaign trail!
Purdue Football Homecoming is this Saturday. We expect nice weather and a fun tailgate, so come join us! https://t.co/Lt8SgaIhPW
Enjoyed being in the Attica Heritage Days Parade this afternoon!
We couldn't have asked for a more perfect day for a parade. The Burlington Fall Festival is in full swing this weekend and if you get a chance, go visit their huge antique tractor display!
Started the day in White County at the Apple Popcorn Festival Pancake Breakfast. It was a pleasure to spend time visiting with voters and talk about the issues most important to them.

The Purdue University Vietnam Commemorative Committee did a wonderful job of having a luncheon for Vietnam-Era Veterans at the National Guard Armory in Lafayette. Rolling Thunder Chapter 1 and American Legion... https://t.co/mqjIRJfL5v
Fun day out on the campaign trail! From Frankfort to Kokomo, it was great to be with friends working towards a big November for the GOP.

What a magnificent tribute to agriculture! The weather was perfect in the town of Oxford, located in Benton County Indiana, as the community celebrated the contribution that production agriculture makes to our rural economies. — in Oxford, IN https://t.co/3twR8cqSJl
Great to be in Kokomo this morning. Howard County Republicans are working hard to elect candidates willing to serve and put their communities first . #LeadRight https://t.co/KNTr6SY5SF
The rain couldn’t put a damper on the republican spirit for the Monrovia parade! — attending Monrovia Festival at Monrovia Festival & Civic Association https://t.co/KKtdSEq658
Great turnout in White County this evening in support of Rep. Don Lehe. He is a great friend and an excellent advocate for his district.
Spent the evening with friends in Putnam County, talking about the issues important to them.
As a fellow Rotarian it was an honor to speak with the Brownsburg Rotary Club. Rotary is a tremendous civic organization helping make their communities better places to live and work.

Had a great parade with Senator Niemeyer, Chairman Bruce Buchanan and all the Benton County Republican Party  GOP team. Enthusiastic crowd, especially children, along the parade route in Earl Park. — at Benton County, Indiana https://t.co/ogpq7WoNxB

Had a great day in Congressional District 4. Started at 6am with coffee with friends followed by a parade in North Salem. Over 100 units and weather that was unusually pleasant and there was a large crowd on... https://t.co/JYXDe6jkIy
Congratulations Donya Lester on her retirement as Executive Director of the Purdue Ag Alumni Association. She has been a tremendous leader and we wish her all the best.
Spent the day crisscrossing District 04. With a final stop at the Putnam Country GOP Annual Hog Roast and Pie Auction.
Glad to spend time with our friends in Rossville today. The local fire department put on a wonderful pancake breakfast and the Summer's End Festival Parade turned out great in spite of all the rain!
Great evening with the Indiana Federation of Republican Women. They're working hard to help elect great candidates all over Indiana.
Thanks to all the supporters of the Hendricks County Republican Party. It was fun to welcome you all and kick off the golf scramble!

Logistics and distribution play a major part of our workforce in CD4. It was great to tour the UPS facility in Plainfield this morning and learn more about what they are doing to be a community partner.
Annual Hog Roast and Pie Auction Aug 25th 5 pm https://t.co/oaxRfgzIxw
Attended an informative luncheon this afternoon about growth and economic development, hosted by the Greater Lafayette Chamber of Commerce.
Great crowd this morning at the Hendricks County Republican Party Chairman's Breakfast.
It was a full house tonight for the pork chop dinner in Belle Union — at Belle Union Fire Department https://t.co/wfWyLSeZEZ
Great to see our Secretary of State Connie Lawson and spend time with the Morgan County Indiana Republican Party at their monthly breakfast. https://t.co/8ua38tppcS

Learn about a great community in the 4th District. We're looking forward to the Summer's End Festival!

https://t.co/qJCKvqXmEk https://t.co/qJCKvqXmEk

We spent yesterday visiting with friends at the Indiana State Fair. Agriculture plays a huge role in our State. Special thank you to the staff and volunteers at the State Fair who help tell that story.
Come on out and see us! https://t.co/7dj8vxbaXP
We spent this beautiful Saturday morning walking in the Touch of Dutch Parade in DeMotte. Thanks to all the great Jasper County Indiana Republican Party candidates and volunteers who walked too!
https://t.co/e88r3UrZwp

This afternoon we had the pleasure of joining the Morgan County Indiana Republican Party in the Mooresville Old Settlers Parade. We got to say hello to a lot of friendly folks who are looking forward to their Old Settlers Festival this week.

I started the day full of meetings

Putnam County Republican Party  started the day with a energized room the team was very pleased with County Fair Booth and the level of Republican participation in the Parade... https://t.co/ZNtJhpSoAq

This morning we attended the Indiana Pork Producers' Ham Breakfast to help kickoff the Indiana State Fair. This year's Indiana State Fair Queen is Fountain County's very own Audrey Campbell. We're looking forward to a great State Fair!
Spent the morning in Cloverdale learning about the opioid challenges facing rural communities.

Thank you to Morton Farms for an excellent venue and perfect sunny 75 degree evening in the heart of Indiana's farm country. The food from Shoup's added to the pleasure of the experience. Also, thank you to all... https://t.co/hlGweIgln0
Pleasant weather for and excellent Morgan County Fair. — at Morgan County Fair and 4-H Association https://t.co/3mFVwucm5Q
What a perfect evening to visit the Benton County Fair!
Thank you to the Hendricks County Young Republicans for having me as their guest speaker. They're excited to help elect great Republican candidates all across Indiana!
Great evening at the Boone County 4-H Fair. A lot of good looking livestock are ready for their shows. You can tell the 4-Hers have been working hard!
Huge turnout this evening for the Tippecanoe County 4-H Queen Contest. Also, the Tippecanoe County GOP has a great looking booth. If you're at the fair, be sure to stop by.
The rain couldn't keep us away from the Putnam County 4-H Parade. Getting to see so many friends always makes this parade extra special.
